tags: [component, checkbox]
---
# ti-widget-checkbox

 `ti-widget-checkbox` is a widget that can be either checked or unchecked.
 
  Examples:
  
  ```html
	 <ti-widget-checkbox label="my text"></ti-widget-checkbox>
	 <ti-widget-checkbox checked label="This is a checked checkbox"></ti-widget-checkbox>
	 <ti-widget-checkbox disabled label="This is a disabled checkbox"></ti-widget-checkbox>
  ```

  See [demo](demo/index.html) for a full working example of how to use this component.
